name: superposition
xml: <qcircuit><qubit id="0"><gate name="H" column="0" qubit="0"/></qubit><qubit id="1"><gate name="H" column="0" qubit="1"/></qubit><qubit id="2"><gate name="H" column="0" qubit="2"/></qubit></qcircuit>
desc: Create a uniform superposition of all possible states of a quantum register.

name: entanglement
xml: <qcircuit><qubit id="0"><gate name="H" column="0" qubit="0"/><gate name="CONTROL" column="1" qubit="0"><controlled><gate name="X" column="1" qubit="1"/></controlled></gate></qubit></qcircuit>
desc: Enforce a strong correlation between qubits by entangling them.

name: initialization
xml: <qcircuit><qubit id="0"><gate name="X" column="0" qubit="0"/></qubit><qubit id="1"><gate name="Y" column="0" qubit="1"/></qubit><qubit id="2"><gate name="Z" column="0" qubit="2"/></qubit></qcircuit>
desc: Initialize the input of a quantum register, taking into account the prerequisites of the subsequent steps of the algorithm.

name: oracle
desc: Re-use a computation of a quantum algorithm without necessarily knowing the implementation.

name: uncompute
xml: <qcircuit><qubit id="0"><gate name="CONTROL" column="0" qubit="0"><controlled><gate name="X" column="0" qubit="2"/></controlled></gate><gate name="CONTROL" column="1" qubit="0"><controlled><gate name="CONTROL" column="1" qubit="2"><controlled><gate name="X" column="1" qubit="3"/></controlled></gate></controlled></gate><gate name="CONTROL" column="3" qubit="0"><controlled><gate name="CONTROL" column="3" qubit="2"><controlled><gate name="X" column="3" qubit="3"/></controlled></gate></controlled></gate><gate name="CONTROL" column="4" qubit="0"><controlled><gate name="X" column="4" qubit="2"/></controlled></gate></qubit><qubit id="3"><gate name="CONTROL" column="2" qubit="3"><controlled><gate name="X" column="2" qubit="1"/></controlled></gate></qubit></qcircuit>
desc: Remove entanglement that resulted from a previous computation.
